titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B133_1
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B133_1

item.term: Early first millennium to the fourth century BC (predominance of Saba)
Fourth to first centuries BC (predominance of Qataban and Hadramawt, and their alliance with Main)
First century BC to early second century AD (alliances between the tribes of the high plateau and the ASA kingdoms)
Late second to late third centuries AD (wars among the Himyar, Saba and Hadramawt)
Fourth to sixth centuries AD (unification of Yemen under Himyarite rule)
It corresponds to the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans with sub-periods I-IV
First sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Third sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans

1.škmm | slḥn | bn | rḍw 2.hyś[ʿ]ʾl | ʿlhn | bn | bnʾl | w-d(w) 3.bt | w-n[h]mt | w-gsmhy | gnʾ | q(l) 4.myfʿt | w-ḍ[yft]n | qrnhm | w-bny | 5.[... ...] w-ʾbry | bn-mw
Restored full text of the inscription:
1.škmm | slḥn | bn | rḍw[n | qtdm | h-mrʾ-s | yšhrʾl | yhrʿš | bn | ʾbyśʿ | mkrb | ḥḍrmt | mt | ʾmr-s | mrʾ-sww] 2.hyś[ʿ]ʾl | ʿlhn | bn | bnʾl | w-d(w)[sm | msbm | bn | ẓrb | h-bnʾ | ẓrb | h-bnʾ | ʿqbthn | qlt | w-ʿqb | ḥgr | ʿlhtyhn | bn | bḥrhn | qdmm | ʿlhy | gr=] 3.bt | w-n[h]mt | w-gsmhy | gnʾ | q(l)[t | w-ʿqbhn | mt | ḥḏrw | b-ḥmyrm | w-tbʿ | hyśʿʾl | w-dwsm | w-ʿm-smn | bn | ʾbhty | ḥḍrmt | w-mtsk b-] 4.myfʿt | w-ḍyftn | qrnhm | w-bny | [w-yʿr | ʿqb | ḍyfthn | w-bny | gnʾhn | w-mḥfdyhn | yḏʾn | w-yḏtʾn | w-ḫlfhn | ykn | b-mʿrb | w-śdm | w-ḍwym] 5.[... ... |] w-ʾbry | bn-mw [| rbbm | ʾd | šqrm | bn-mw | lbn | šms | lbn | šms | b-hy | yšrḥʾl | ḏ-ʿḏḏm | śnyhn | šlśt | ʾwrḫm | b-ʿšry | w-mʾt | ʾsdm | gsmhm]

myfʿt w-ḍyftn qrnhm w-bny w-yʿr ʿqb ḍyfthn w-bny gnʾhn w-mḥfdyhn yḏʾn w-yḏtʾn w-ḫlfhn ykn b-mʿrb w-śdm w-ḍwym

Text preserved in the squeeze:
1.Shakimum Salḥīn bin Riḍw[ān] 2.Hayaśʿʾīl ʿAlhān bin Banaʾīl and Da(w)[sum] 3.[..] and the polished stones and the fill of the wall of Qa(la)[t] 4.Mayfaʿt and Ḍayfatān as a garrison; and he built 5.[... ...] and the passages(?) from
Restored full text of the inscription:
1.Shakimum Salḥīn bin Riḍw[ān has directed for his lord, Yashhurʾīl Yuharʿish bin ʾAbīyaśaʿ, the ruler of Ḥaḍramōt, when his two lords,] 2.Hayaśʿʾīl ʿAlhān bin Banaʾīl and Da(w)[sum Masabum bin Ẓarab, commanded him to build the defenses of Qalat and the defenses of Ḥigr, the elevated area from the seashore in front, on the terrace(?)] 3.[..] and the polished stones and the fill of the wall of Qa(la)[t and the defenses, when they were on their guard against Ḥimyarum. And Hayaśaʿʾīl and Dawsum went forth, and with them were some of the high-ranking officials of Ḥaḍramōt; and they arrived at] 4.Mayfaʿt and Ḍayfatān as a garrison; and he built [and strengthened the defenses of Ḍayfatān and he built the wall and the two towers of Yadhaʾān and Yadhatʾān and the gate of Yakan, in polished stone, and a barrier and a refuge] 5.[... ...] and the passages(?) from [the base to the top, by the grace of Shamas in the second year of Yashraḥʾīl Dhū-ʿAzīzum, in three months, the construction by 120 men.]

Text preserved in the squeeze:
Shakimum Salḥīn bin Riḍwān
Hayaśʿʾīl ʿAlhān bin Banaʾīl and Daw sum
.. and the polished stones and the fill of the wall of Qala t
Mayfaʿt and Ḍayfatān as a garrison; and he built
and the passages? from
Restored full text of the inscription:
Shakimum Salḥīn bin Riḍwān has directed for his lord, Yashhurʾīl Yuharʿish bin ʾAbīyaśaʿ, the ruler of Ḥaḍramōt, when his two lords,
Hayaśʿʾīl ʿAlhān bin Banaʾīl and Daw sum Masabum bin Ẓarab, commanded him to build the defenses of Qalat and the defenses of Ḥigr, the elevated area from the seashore in front, on the terrace?
.. and the polished stones and the fill of the wall of Qala t and the defenses, when they were on their guard against Ḥimyarum. And Hayaśaʿʾīl and Dawsum went forth, and with them were some of the high-ranking officials of Ḥaḍramōt; and they arrived at
Mayfaʿt and Ḍayfatān as a garrison; and he built and strengthened the defenses of Ḍayfatān and he built the wall and the two towers of Yadhaʾān and Yadhatʾān and the gate of Yakan, in polished stone, and a barrier and a refuge
and the passages? from the base to the top, by the grace of Shamas in the second year of Yashraḥʾīl Dhū-ʿAzīzum, in three months, the construction by
men.

Text preserved in the squeeze:
Shakimum Salḥīn bin Riḍwān
Hayaśʿʾīl ʿAlhān bin Banaʾīl and Dawsum
.. and the polished stones and the fill of the wall of Qalat
Mayfaʿt and Ḍayfatān as a garrison; and he built
and the passages? from
Restored full text of the inscription:
Shakimum Salḥīn bin Riḍwān has directed for his lord, Yashhurʾīl Yuharʿish bin ʾAbīyaśaʿ, the ruler of Ḥaḍramōt, when his two lords,
Hayaśʿʾīl ʿAlhān bin Banaʾīl and Dawsum Masabum bin Ẓarab, commanded him to build the defenses of Qalat and the defenses of Ḥigr, the elevated area from the seashore in front, on the terrace?
.. and the polished stones and the fill of the wall of Qalat and the defenses, when they were on their guard against Ḥimyarum. And Hayaśaʿʾīl and Dawsum went forth, and with them were some of the high-ranking officials of Ḥaḍramōt; and they arrived at
Mayfaʿt and Ḍayfatān as a garrison; and he built and strengthened the defenses of Ḍayfatān and he built the wall and the two towers of Yadhaʾān and Yadhatʾān and the gate of Yakan, in polished stone, and a barrier and a refuge
and the passages? from the base to the top, by the grace of Shamas in the second year of Yashraḥʾīl Dhū-ʿAzīzum, in three months, the construction by
men.

Text preserved in the squeeze:

Hayaśʿʾīl ʿAlhān bin Banaʾīl and Dawsum
.. and the polished stones and the fill of the wall of Qalat
Mayfaʿt and Ḍayfatān as a garrison; and he built
and the passages? from
Restored full text of the inscription:
Shakimum Salḥīn bin Riḍwān has directed for his lord, Yashhurʾīl Yuharʿish bin ʾAbīyaśaʿ, the ruler of Ḥaḍramōt, when his two lords,
Hayaśʿʾīl ʿAlhān bin Banaʾīl and Dawsum Masabum bin Ẓarab, commanded him to build the defenses of Qalat and the defenses of Ḥigr, the elevated area from the seashore in front, on the terrace?
.. and the polished stones and the fill of the wall of Qalat and the defenses, when they were on their guard against Ḥimyarum. And Hayaśaʿʾīl and Dawsum went forth, and with them were some of the high-ranking officials of Ḥaḍramōt; and they arrived at
Mayfaʿt and Ḍayfatān as a garrison; and he built and strengthened the defenses of Ḍayfatān and he built the wall and the two towers of Yadhaʾān and Yadhatʾān and the gate of Yakan, in polished stone, and a barrier and a refuge
and the passages? from the base to the top, by the grace of Shamas in the second year of Yashraḥʾīl Dhū-ʿAzīzum, in three months, the construction by
men.
